Rule4: The living creature that swears to the shark will also swear to the seal, without a doubt. Rule5: The living creature that swears to the frog will never call the zebra. Rule6: Be careful when something does not manage to convince the snake but calls the zebra because in this case it certainly does not swear to the seal (this may or may not be problematic). Rule2 is preferred over Rule5. Rule6 is preferred over Rule4.
